description.@en: My independence found me at the gates of hell. Now I cannot trust myself, but I find comfort in the steady guiding hand of another. I will follow their lead, even if it sits poorly with me. I need stability in ways I cannot describe.

effect.@en: You gain an Assist Die whenever you are told what to do by another in character. However, you cannot take advantage of Coins to fulfill your own self-interests.
